description: To find an interesting fact about the AI field, tell a joke related to it, evaluate the joke, and combine all elements into a humorous story.

nodes.objective: Search for an interesting fact about the AI field.
Generate a joke related to the interesting fact found in Node 1.
Evaluate the joke generated in Node 2 for humor and relevance.
Combine the interesting fact from Node 1, the joke from Node 2, and the evaluation from Node 3 into a funny story.
